snippet: A survey conducted by a group called Transparify has caused ripples in the think tank world before its official release, with some organizations disclosing more information on donors.
abstract: Survey conducted by nonprofit group Transparify finds that both liberal and conservative think-tank organizations in Washington share poor records of disclosing their sources of financing; survey is part of push for transparency in institutions that help shape public policy.
lead_paragraph: A survey conducted by a group called Transparify has caused ripples in the think tank world before its official release, with some organizations disclosing more information on donors.

headline.main: Major Research Groups Are Given Low Marks on Disclosing Donors
headline.print_headline: Major Research Groups Are Given Low Marks on Disclosing Donors
